renewed-contributions.title: Silver Trail
renewed-contributions.note: Author is Frederick Faust writing under a pseudonym. CCE renewal record reports this as only appearing in this issue, but FictionMags records this story as serialized in 6 parts between October 27 and December 1. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: Thunder Moon Goes White
renewed-contributions.note: Author is Frederick Faust writing under a pseudonym. CCE renewal record reports this as a 4-part story running November 3-24, but FictionMags records this story as only appearing in this issue. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

renewed-contributions.title: Silver Trail

renewed-contributions.title: The Flaming Rider
renewed-contributions.note: Author is Frederick Faust writing under a pseudonym. CCE renewal record reports this as a 6-part story running December 29, 1928 - February 2, 1929, but FictionMags records this story as only appearing in this issue. We have not examined the issue ourselves.

additional-note: Active contribution renewals are recorded beginning in the 1955 January-June CCE volume, but the earliest actively renewed contribution is noted in the 1955 July-December volume.
